ibo,.bose-icon.bose-icon--youku,.bose-icon.bose-icon--youtube{width:2em;height:2em}@font-face{font-family:Gotham;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(../base2016/design/fonts/0BAE74D4CEF690C04.eot);src:local("?"),url(../base2016/design/fonts/0BAE74D4CEF690C04.eot?#hco)
